nodes.text: Pilot droids, also known as droid pilots, were droids used to pilot vehicles like starships. During the Clone Wars, the Separatist Alliance made extensive use of OOM pilot battle droids. Fourteen years later, the RX-series pilot droids were used to fly the Star Commuter 2000 shuttles from Lothal. Another model was the FA-4 pilot droid, one of which piloted Count Dooku's own Punworcca 116-class interstellar sloop. L3-37 was Lando Calrissian's copilot when he owned the Millennium Falcon during the early days of the Galactic Empire. She was a custom, self-created pilot droid.[source?]
